T = int(raw_input())
while T > 0:
	T -= 1
	P = int(raw_input())
	Wp = raw_input().split(' ')
	Wr = raw_input().split(' ')
	Wp = map(int, Wp)
	Wr = map(int, Wr)
	Wp.sort()
	Wr.sort()
	counter = 0
	numPies = 0
	j = 0
	for item in Wp:
		for ctr in range(j, len(Wr)):
			if item <= Wr[ctr]:
				numPies += 1
				j = ctr+1
				break
	print numPies
